transcript.text: hi and welcome you listening to the x 22

and people have been withdrawing their
money and that this is still going on
and most of the people I mean keeping

we haven't seen a while bank run but the
Greek people realize what happened in

bail ins I should say and they went
ahead and they started to withdraw their

and the wealthy have also pulled a lot

and transferred it to other areas and
what Greece is reporting right now is
they're starting to see some of that

using these funds because they have

we've been following it we've been

throughout Europe we're seeing it in the

and it is spreading right now and like
we said when this thing goes south like

because as we go down this hill we're

we're seeing right now here in the
States what were we saying well we're

we're seeing a lot of businesses lay off

inventories right now on dealer lots are

your
piya nation's manufacturing down in the

we're going to go through these
